1.Name: Kalia Village Test
1.Author: Zunath
1.Description: First exterior area I've made. More will come.

2.Name: Kina Plains
2.Author: Zunath
2.Description:
A 16x16 exterior area. You'll find beaches, lakes, mountains, grasslands and a chasm all in a single area. :)

I didn't place any creatures and there's only a few placeables for you to populate yourself.

Hope you like it.

3.Name: Farm
3.Author: Duffus
3.Description: A small farm area for my first attempt at the toolset.

4.Name: Smith Shop
4.Author: Phex
4.Description:
SMITH-SHOP

Here is my first little Prefab, made with the Presale-Toolkit.
A little Smith-Shop mit flickering Lights and a bunch of Placeables.
One Room was left free to add a Cellar or the hidden Storage Room for your Thieves ;-)

Just import the ERF to a new Module.

Hope you enjoy...


Greetz
Phex

5.Name: Walled Village
5.Author: Duffus
5.Description: A small walled village with moat.

6.Name: Oasis
6.Author: Henrik
6.Description:
Just a simple oasis made with the preorder toolset.

Updated added a new water fall and cave, futher more the number of seeds have been limited to 5 in total.

7.Name: Swamphome
7.Author: Feardain
7.Description:
Here is just a mild example of a swamp, though some features are a little off, water color, and a few of the tree types dont originally belong in a swamp, but the image is better. This is only one area of it, and I am not even sure if it is walkable, seeing as there is no way to test.

Terra Forming is a powerful thing, But so is the new toolset. I am loving it.

While trying to decide on how the water would appear to have depth, and actual substance of being a swamp, I found myself at a loss with the Textures given, and shortly decided on useing the terrain tools to make dark spots, or darker as it is.

Actually making the water level work was eaiser then I thought. Starting the base water at 1. I then used the leveling tool to raise the land to about 3, making the boathouse fit in almost perfectly.

It is best viewed as nighttime, and even sunrise and sunset.


This area took a total of 4 and a half hours to get it the way I wanted, and I still have not added many of the lights or sounds.

8.Name: Small Town
8.Author: Duffus
8.Description: A small town with walls and moat. Twice the size of my small village but with a similar layout. Better walls and civilian structures. Cobbled interior grounds.

10.Name: Inn by the forest road
10.Author: Br0adsw0rd
10.Description: The realms are a dangerous place to travel. Using Inns is a good way to reach your destination... alive

11.Name: Generic Inn
11.Author: Marcelo_Lopes
11.Description: It's a generic INN that may fit your campaign setting.

12.Name: Forest with Cabin
12.Author: Duffus
12.Description: A sample forested area, 12x12 in size with a small pond and fishing cabin. It is an autumn setting and the pic was taken a sunrise.

13.Name: Cliff-side Road
13.Author: Veragoan
13.Description: Here is an extreamly bare-bones cliffside trail leading up to a city/village. I hope you all find use for it :)

14.Name: Little Fishing Town
14.Author: Yaheira Naieth
14.Description:
This is my first experience in NWN, never played the first part either.
So... I hope you like it, it is my first area made with the Toolset.

It is a little fishing town, I think it could be a good begining for your adventures.

15.Name: The Sigilarium
15.Author: Cynroth
15.Description: Whoops!! Dumb 'ol me uploaded the wrong version, a "not quite ready for prime time" vewrsion... Sorry about that... *This* is the more mature version of my generic magic store for NWN 2...

16.Name: Merchant Shop
16.Author: Kimosavi
16.Description: Small Merchant shop to get modules going. Will be working with a lot more areas for a module, so expect more.

18.Name: Tristam the town
18.Author: Shadow of Dreams
18.Description:
This was my original Starting city but it was to big so I had to cut it in 3 parts for my server.but this is the whole version maby someone likes it

the screenshot is of a swamp north of the town the town is more of farmers.
just look at it.

19.Name: Reds Wilderness Village
19.Author: Redunzgofasta
19.Description:
Deep within the wilderness the people of this village have carved a life for themselves. They generally mind their own business and like visitors to oo the same.

This is my first nwn2 area prefab and it will probably be on the "heavy" side, just like my nwn1 prefabs.

Since I could not test the area I did not bother about sound too much. When nwn2 goes gold I will tweak and update the area.

There was a problem with the walkmesh (I was so eager to upload this area when I finally finished it that I forgot all about it) so I updated the file.

20.Name: Mountain City
20.Author: Tank6ge
20.Description: This is the revised version of mountain city. Many friends of mine requested that I add more placeables into this prefab area and add a bit more texture. This is what I have come up with. Feedback is appreciated. If you like this area check out my chasm/cave prefab. Also, as of now I can't actually go in the game to test this area (since I haven't gotten the box yet) - so hopefully there aren't any flying trees etc... :)

21.Name: Haunted House
21.Author: Marcelo_Lopes
21.Description: A haunted house on a hill, great potential for puzzles and horror adventures for your campaign.

22.Name: Sea Side City
22.Author: Cheyne
22.Description:
My first prefab, itï¿½s a nice little starter town/city on the edge of the sea.

It has some farming, mining areas, nice Warf with lots of warehouses on the water front. All it needs is more lamps on the streets.

Texturing little dodgy but at lest it still looks good :)

Comments and votes are welcomed

23.Name: The Peninsula
23.Author: Plane Walker
23.Description: This NWN2 area consists of a town that exists below a large hill that extends onto a peninsula. At the top is a state building with other estates nearby. Though it is somewhat walled in, it is not a keep or military setup - thuough it could be quickly be changed to become one.

24.Name: The Edge of the World
24.Author: Plane Walker
24.Description: This NWN2 area consists of a town at the edge of a cliff that doesn't seem to have a bottom. This town contains rural homes, merchant quarters and other homes located on 3 teirs of land overwhich looks a large temple atop the tallest hill. This mod has a fully functional walkmesh.

25.Name: Rural City
25.Author: ap0r
25.Description:
It's my first area for nwn2, i hope you like it ^^


i used a partical system for waterfalls, go to ...\nwn2toolset\Data and override your file "nwn2_VFX.zip".

26.Name: Natakue's Villiage
26.Author: Natakue
26.Description:
This is a small area that I created for my new NWN2 mod. This is the first exterior area that I have created in the new Toolset so please keep that in mind. Please take a look and give me all the info you have and fell free to use it how you wish. 

Whats in the area----
I place a Blacksmith shop in the back cornner of the area and decided to make it an outdoor area. Next the the blacksmith I got creative with a house and made that the weaponsmith/shop.

Mage building...
I caould not find a good mage build IMO so I used a windmill. I figured hey...he uses the power to fule his research...go figure!

A samll inn, there is a temple area in the back or front...not sure. The gated area is an area for local highup or in my mods case merc's! 

I hope you enjoy!
Natakue

27.Name: ValleRoble - OakValley
27.Author: Mr_Floppy
27.Description:
Este es mi primer ï¿½rea con el Electron, no seais demasiado duros! Es una pequeï¿½a aldea de leï¿½adores, con algunas casas rurales, una posada, una alcaldï¿½a, asï¿½ como un rï¿½o por el que enviar a la ciudad los troncos. Sera el ï¿½rea de inicio para mi mï¿½dulo con el NWN 2.

This is my first area with Electron, so please donï¿½t be too hard with me! Itï¿½s a little woodcutterï¿½s village, with rural houses, an inn, the mayorï¿½s estate and a river used to send the wood to a near town. This will be the starting area of my first mod for NWN2.

28.Name: Gothic Town
28.Author: DS Divine
28.Description:
This is completly surrounded by mountains and sea town, that I call "Gothic"

This is my first experience with NWN2 toolset.

30.Name: Havendale

32.Name: Swamp Lands

32.Description: My first attempt at swamps the area will be tweaked after NWN2 is released.

36.Name: Desert Oasis

36.Description: Another Rural town, this time in a desert setting. Feedback and comments welcome.

39.Name: Chasm-cave
39.Author: Tank6ge
39.Description:
When I first made this area, it was with the pre-sale toolset. There were many problems with it. I believe I have fixed all of these! If you look at the sides of the cliff you will see how I fixed the texture stretching probem.. the bridge works now, it now starts in the right place, the objects are placed correctly etc.. The in-game shots reflect my poor graphics card.. there is no grass etc.. 
I have also noticed an occasional white square popping up.. I have minimized these and as of yet I haven't figured out how to completely eliminate them, but at this point they are hardly noticeable. Hope you like the update! One other great thing about this area is you should be able to change the size and still get a very functional area that is slightly larger with the trail. 

I deleted the former version which had a DL count of 180 because I didn't want anyone accidentally downloading it. Feedback is appreciated! I am in the process of updating some of my older areas which were created in the pre-sale toolset. Don't forget to look at the new versions as they get updated.
 
Come see what we are doing at ewclan.net we are always looking for new players/builders 

EW Tank

40.Name: The Fighting Arenas. v2.0
40.Author: Simon L'Aleph
40.Description:
This is a prefab area called The Arenas.
It contains a pack of arenas that significantly differ from the OC arena which is closer to an Amphitheater than an arena set for combat.

Update 2.0 :
- The Forest Arena 
- The Stone Arena
Update 1.5 :
The Barbarian Arena (barbarian/orcish style) :
- First ring fully walkable for NPCs (only)
- Upper ring partially walkable for NPCs.

- Topography updated.

To come :
- The snowny Arena
- The Magic Arena 
 
All the builders who want to help, you're welcome, please email me. 
Please don't forget to post your comments and vote ! 
Check for updates !

41.Name: Bowser Bridge
41.Author: Tank6ge
41.Description:
This is the first edition of what I'll call the Bowser bridge because it reminds me of the bridge before Bowser in the original game. Anyway you don't have to use it for that, but I like this area because of the red glowing water which I am trying here to make seem like lava. I didn't really like the lava placeable so hopefully this works out as a good alternative for that. (I placed the lava placeable under the water for an orangish glow.. I am not sure that I will update this area again, but I may make a bigger version. Please leave feedback!

You can see other screenshots of areas I am working on at:

http://server6.theimagehosting.com/album.php?album=19904&user_id=72237&
public_view=1

42.Name: Hemlock's Arcane Supplies v2
42.Author: Paul Williams
42.Description:
HEMLOCK'S ARCANE SUPPLIES v2
+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+
by Paul Williams

A dark and mysterious magic shop for your adventures. It features an inner sanctum behind the counter with usable alchemical and magic workbenches, which is perfect as a reward for a sidequest or for a cutscene.

If used, please credit me in your work. I'd love to see what people use this for, so send me an email.

Updates
+=+=+=+
Added sounds to torches.
Added walkmesh cutters to most objects to improve collision detection.
Changed music to "Crypt 2".

43.Name: The Prison
43.Author: Plane Walker
43.Description: This area consists of 3 primary sections - the entrance, the prison cells, and the furnaces. Great for use in a prison rescue attempt, or an escape attempt by the player(s). There are no creatures/NPC's in this area - I leave those to you.

44.Name: The Path to the Red Dragon
44.Author: Tank6ge
44.Description:
*** This area has been completely updated to smooth out some of the textures, remove unecessary and floating objects. I have added all new screenshots as well so you can see the difference. With the new texture I had to re-do the walkmesh as well but the overall area of it is pretty much the same. I removed the old version of this area 


This is a winding path to an old castle where an old red dragon now lives. Many warriors have come before and not been able to survive the harsh terrain. Those who do make it will have to face what is to come within the once populated castle. Eventually I may add some effects to this area, and there will be much more added for the mod that I am working with, but this is a pre-fab area and I will let you decide how to challenge the players here. The various cliffs and raised terrain here give certain types of mobs a distinct advantage. 


To see what I am working on now or other screenshots go to http://server6.theimagehosting.com/user.php?user_id=72237&public_view=1

Some of my areas will be used with the EW clan at www.ewclan.net There you can visit the Lankhmar forums or see what they are doing. 

If you would like to use this area, then please let me know. I have deleted the previous screenshots as to not cause confusion. Enjoy!!!

45.Name: New Haven
45.Author: Eshin
45.Description:
Port town of New Haven, it's a 20x20 outdoor area.. if you use this for your PW or module please give some credit to the people who create stuff for the community.


** Updated New Haven V.92(2006-NOV-20)**
- Fixed walkmeshi problems
- Fixed the bridge
+ Added more to estate grounds areas

46.Name: Forest Pathway
46.Author: Tank6ge
46.Description:
This is a transition area through a forest with a rocky river. Yep that's it :) - If you use it please let me know. Feedback is appreciated.
